name: Acentria Technologies (P) Ltd
tagline: Web and Mobile App Development Company
description:
Acentria Technologies (P) Ltd. is a well established software development organisation working from past 2 years having clientage all over the world.The company deals in a varied range of services such as Software development (Both website and Desktop), Mobile apps design and development, Games Development and Server Support. 
The name and business strength that has been earned by our organization today is due to the professionally equipped and able staff, which has a varied experience of the Indian market as well as Overseas market and good knowledge of serving the customers to their satisfaction. This is further enhanced by the innovative ideas of the management, who strive from time to time in creating awareness and keeping the company at par to the latest development of today's world. 
We Work On...
1. Website Development 
2. iOS Mobile Application  
3. Android Application 
4. SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
What you can expect from Us ? 
1. On time delivery of your projects. 
2. Cost effectiveness. 
3. Improved quality products. 
4. Overall productivity improvement in your business. 
5. Customer Satisfaction. 
Our Strength 
1. Thoroughly review and understand client's requirements. 
2. Excellent Communications and Verbal skills. 
3. SDLC and Project Management Expertise. 
4. Two years of experience in Software Industry serving overseas customers. 
5. In depth Domain Knowledge in diverse fields 
6. Excellence in executing short and long-term projects to your specific requirements. 
7. Exploring the full potential of the internet to get and execute projects. 
Visit us for more details
